org.echo.mobile.framework.facade

Interface TransactionsFacade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EchoFramework
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EchoFrameworkImpl, TransactionsFacadeImpl

    public TransactionsFacade

    Encapsulates logic, associated with various blockchain transactions processes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendTransferOperation(java.lang.String nameOrId, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String toNameOrId, java.lang.String amount, java.lang.String asset, java.lang.String feeAsset, java.lang.String message, Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Submits transaction to blockchain
      void sendTransferOperationWithWif(java.lang.String nameOrId, java.lang.String wif, java.lang.String toNameOrId, java.lang.String amount, java.lang.String asset, java.lang.String feeAsset, java.lang.String message, Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
      Submits transaction to blockchain

    • Method Detail

      • sendTransferOperation

        void sendTransferOperation(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           java.lang.String toNameOrId,
                           java.lang.String amount,
                           java.lang.String asset,
                           java.lang.String feeAsset,
                           java.lang.String message,
                           Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Submits transaction to blockchain

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Source account name or id
        password - Source account password for retrieving access to funds
        toNameOrId - Transfer target account name or id
        amount - Value amount of transfer operation
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Specific asset type id for calculating fee. If null - asset will be used
        message - Additional payload to transfer operation
        callback - Listener of operation results. Retrieves true if transfer succeed, otherwise - false

      • sendTransferOperationWithWif

        void sendTransferOperationWithWif(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                  java.lang.String wif,
                                  java.lang.String toNameOrId,
                                  java.lang.String amount,
                                  java.lang.String asset,
                                  java.lang.String feeAsset,
                                  java.lang.String message,
                                  Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Submits transaction to blockchain

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Source account name or id
        wif - Account's private key in wif format
        toNameOrId - Transfer target account name or id
        amount - Value amount of transfer operation
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Specific asset type id for calculating fee. If null - asset will be used
        message - Additional payload to transfer operation
        callback - Listener of operation results. Retrieves true if transfer succeed, otherwise - false
